properties.entry: SELECT P.IMAGE_URL1 ,P.P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,P.PRICE FROM REVIEW R JOIN PRODUCT P ON (R.P_CODE = P.P_CODE) JOIN OR_PRODUCT OP ON (P.P_CODE = OP.P_CODE) JOIN "ORDER" O ON (OP.OR_NO = O.OR_NO) WHERE R.MEM_NO=1 AND WRITE_YN='N'

내가 작성한 리뷰 SELECT IMAGE_URL ,P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,PRICE ,REVIEW_SCORE ,REVIEW_CONTENT FROM REVIEW JOIN ORDER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT USING(OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO=? AND WRITE_YN='Y'
리뷰 쓰기창 필요한 내용 불러오기 SELECT IMAGE_URL ,P_NAME ,OR_DATE ,PRICE FROM REVIEW JOIN ORDER USING(MEM_NO) JOIN OR_PRODUCT USING(OR_NO) JOIN PRODUCT USING(P_CODE) WHERE MEM_NO = ?
리뷰 쓰기창 작성한 내용 추가하기 INSERT INTO REVIEW ( REVIEW_SCOPE , REVIEW_CONTENT , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( ? , ? , ? )
